(of a job, attempt, etc.) done very badly: botched job Our landlord redecorated the bedroom, but it was such a botched job that we decided to redo it.botched operation He had a botched operation on a severely perforated eardrum that left him deaf in his right ear. The campaign to control the disease was badly botched.
